document.full_text: axa  on thursday said it was confident it would raise profits this year in spite of a drop in first-quarter sales as europe's second-biggest insurer implements a strategy shift focused on improving margins.
document.title: axa keeps 2011 outlook, q1 sales down 2 percent
lines_and_colors: axa  on thursday said it was confident it would raise profits this year in spite of a drop in first-quarter sales as europe's second-biggest insurer implements a strategy shift focused on improving margins.
